root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 8-10-2, translated into en
root.data:
- Number of people aged 15 years and older with payment accounts at banks and foreign bank branches: Compiled by the State Bank from administrative data

- Population aged 15 years and over: Summary from the Census of the General Statistics Office

- The State Bank calculates the quota from data on the number of people aged 15 years and over with current accounts at banks and foreign bank branches and data on the population aged 15 and over from the General Department Statistical.
